TopicTitle: Can someone make a red flashing light?

Articles.Content:
Umm.. hi. I've looked for a little red flashing light (yellow would also be a nice choice for construction parts in motion) for different situations on a space station or like for my space tractor. I don't have a programmer's skillset, so was wanting to suggest this idea for someone to come up with a simple mod add-on with this in it. I think this is something which is really needed, especially when we're sending astro-kerbals to spacewalk and do lots of stuff eva.

yellow caution light = https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRd0wkGqaQuy4c_IdR4UlQv1ul0ypYY8WR2cR1CElEcvV2B_CdeRA

red warning light = https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS-XZQ0Uj8U8cABEXT0zxBm6qPAiH5DCMerCZlVrD2uI0b2VRml

I think I remember this mod pack contained an orange flashing light: USI Exploration Pack

There are quite a few other parts in the pack that you could delete if you don't want.

1) There's a mod called "Aviation Lights" that still works.

2) You're on the wrong place. This is for suggesting features for the game to the devs. If you haven't noticed, there's one called "Addon requests and support" or something like that. Might be easier for you to get helpful information there.

And since you're pretty new still, welcome to the forum!
Aviation lights are great for this. You can change the rate of flashing by editing the cfg.
This looks like a suggestion for a mod rather than the stock game, and so, moved.

Thank you Vanamonde for moving the thread, was not familiar with the particulars of where this fit. Was sort'ov maybe thinking it would not fit where it was first posted.

I haven't found the aviation lights mod yet, but am still looking. The exploration pack is slowly loading (on dial-up) so I will look forward to seeing what the 20.5 MB file has available in about an hour when it finishes downloading.

So.. I guess I should take lunch and come back then. Thank you all for such prompt replies and your thoughts. It's nice to find an active board with questions so quickly addressed. :-)

-Sasami (^___^)/

Edited November 30, 2014 by Sasami_TN

...

I haven't found the aviation lights mod yet, but am still looking.

...

Don't you mean 'haven't searched'? A simple title search on the forum for 'Aviation Lights' gave just one result: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/16925-0-25-Aviation-Lights-v3-6-%2803MAY14%29

http://www.pix8.net/pro/pic.php?u=3365epM5u&i=11591507

It game me 16 pages to search through, approx 22 threads per page (or something). So it would take me awhile to look through all the threads to find out why it was captured in the "aviation lights" qwery search. How did you just end up with one result?

Edited November 30, 2014 by Sasami_TN

I did not "Search Entire Posts". Instead I did "Search Titles Only"

If you're searching for a specific mod it's best only to search the titles. Doing so will ignore all the discussions about that mod leaving you with a MUCH shorter and more comprehensive list. Your search mentioned EVERY topic that ever mentioned either the word 'aviation' or 'lights'. And since those are both very common words I am not surprised you got so many 'results'.

Edited November 30, 2014 by Tex_NL
